aggregate_strength.note: Aggregate strength from general Regia Aeronautica Libya records (~400 aircraft maintained). After heavy losses in early 1941 (Operation Compass), reinforced with Rommel's arrival. Operational rate 60% typical for Italian forces in North Africa.

sources: Wikipedia - Regia Aeronautica (maintained ~400 aircraft in Libya)
Historical records - Reinforcements arrived with Rommel after early 1941 losses
metadata.notes: General strength estimate (~400 aircraft) for Libya theater in September-October 1941. After Operation Compass losses (300-400 aircraft lost by January 1941), Regia Aeronautica reinforced with new aircraft types (MC.200, MC.202) arriving with Rommel. Operational rate ~60% typical. Exact unit breakdown not available in free sources. Italian archives (Ufficio Storico) would have detailed gruppo strengths.
metadata.future_enhancement: Italian Ufficio Storico archives for exact gruppo/squadriglia breakdown
